FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 353 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 **JEUX DE DANSE** 2003 f CAROLINE'S DANCE, by Pleasant Colony. Winner at 3, $18,035. Sent from United States to Mexico in 2003. Half-sister to **VIVA PANCHO** (Horse of the year in Panama (2000), Imported champion 3-year-old colt in Panama (2000), champion stayer in Panama (2000), 1st Premio Presidente de la Republica [L], etc.), **Mysunshinecaroline** ($59,855, 3rd Remington Park Oaks [L] (RP, $5,500)). Dam of 11 foals, 11 to race, 9 winners-- update on line 47: + **JEUX DE DANSE** (2003 f. by Grand Slam). 9 wins, 3 to 5, $231,017, 1st Copano S. (CRC, $30,000).
